solution_line_template: If Charlize was {charlize_late_minutes} minutes late, each of her friends was {charlize_late_minutes}+{friends_later_than_charlize} = <<{charlize_late_minutes}+{friends_later_than_charlize}={friends_late_minutes}>>{friends_late_minutes} minutes late.

The total time for which Charlize's friends were late was {num_classmates}*{friends_late_minutes}= <<{num_classmates}*{friends_late_minutes}={total_friends_late_minutes}>>{total_friends_late_minutes} minutes.

Together with Charlize, the three friends were {total_friends_late_minutes}+{charlize_late_minutes} = <<{total_friends_late_minutes}+{charlize_late_minutes}={total_all_students_late_minutes}>>{total_all_students_late_minutes} minutes late.
